page.name: welcomehome
page.title: Welcome Home
page.keywords: Regathering, Fall, Church this Fall, Welcome Home, Registration, Pre-register, Pre-registration
page.description: This page provides information on what The Meeting House is doing to re-launch in-person gatherings.

content.title: Online Info Desk.
content.description: This webpage is our online info desk experience. It can be accessed by either scanning a QR code at the welcome table or by entering a unique URL (like themeetinghouse.com/infodesk).

image1.alt: Woman sitting and talking to a friend.
Man sitting and talking to a friend.

content.text1: This webpage is our online info desk experience. It can be accessed by either scanning a QR code at the welcome table or by entering a unique URL (like themeetinghouse.com/infodesk).

We never stopped being the church during COVID.  It just looked a little different.  This fall as we are able to start gathering in person it might look and feel a little different as well but weâ€™re excited to help you get more engaged and find a way for you to learn and grow and get connected into community.

list.title: More about us
list.imageAlt: Watching the teaching from Bruxy Cavey during The Meeting House Sunday morning livestream.

list.title: Home Church
list.text: During the week, we meet in smaller groups to share life, grow deeper spiritual friendship, ask questions and talk openly about living out the teachings of Jesus.  Over the fall some home churches will be online and some will be meeting in person.
list.imageAlt: Online home church meeting using zoom.

list.title: Infants and Kids
list.text: Kids are cool. This description should span no more than 2 lines of text as seen here.
list.imageAlt: Two young children watch The Meeting House kids curriculum on their laptop at home with their mom sitting beside them.

list.title: Youth
list.text: Youth is important. Let's have a section for them too.
list.imageAlt: Two young children watch The Meeting House kids curriculum on their laptop at home with their mom sitting beside them.

list.title: Resources
list.text: We offer books at the info desk. Here is where we list links to go get them online.
list.imageAlt: Two young children watch The Meeting House kids curriculum on their laptop at home with their mom sitting beside them.

image1.alt: A woman is on her phone outside.

content.text1: We have been called to a life of radical generosity, like Jesus! Giving is a great first step to declaring your commitment to Jesus, and this church family. Thank you!

image1.alt: A viewer is watching The Meeting House livestream on their laptop.
A young woman is talking to her friends in the church lobby.

content.text2: Subscribe to our email list and stay on top of the changing circumstances as we navigate this pandemic.
